div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 347 Delos, 1905 (306a) Burial: c. 85-80 B.C. (T); c. 78 or later (Lewis) Contents: 35 AR. From excavations Athens: 13 New Style tetradr. 22 New Style dr. (incl. 2 Sullan) Disposition: Athens (except 7 which were exchanged) Svoronos, JIAN 1906, pp. 254-5 Roussel, Délos, p. 48, note 4 † Thompson, Athens (Delos A), pp. 514-5, illus. (14 coins) Lewis, NC 1962, p. 283
